titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Paul's Covent Garden on the day of thanksgiving Jan. XXXI, 1668 for the great deliverance of this kingdom by the means of His Highness the Prince of Orange from popery and arbitrary power / by Simon Patrick ...
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
